author: Reuters Editorial
title: PFR Life Science Buys Shares Of Selvita For Around 40 Mln Zlotys
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - SELVITA SA:
* SAYS THAT PFR LIFE SCIENCE ACQUIRED COMPANYâ€™S SHARES WORTH AROUND 40 MILLION ZLOTYS IN PUBLIC OFFER
* TOTAL VALUE OF OFFER AMOUNTED TO OVER 134 MILLION ZLOTYS * FUNDS RAISED IN OFFER COMPANY PLANS TO SPEND ON IMPLEMENTATION OF ITS 2017-2021 STRATEGY ANNOUNCED IN AUGUST, 2017
* ESTIMATES THAT TOTAL INVESTMENT COSTS IN YEARS 2017-2021 WILL REACH 390 MILLION ZLOTYS
Source text: bit.ly/2CPz25K Source text for Eikon:
 (Gdynia Newsroom)
